Text: Goldman Sachs Valuation Cc As requested please see attached

RE Garden State PaperThanks for your reply Cheryl Could you both clarify something for me We use the termination log as the basis for terminating our physical and financial deals Now if the log shows the counterparty as terminating the ISDA do we terminate only financial deals Does this mean physical deals unless specified in the log remain as live deals Were just a bit confused as to how we should be using the log to terminate deals Thanks Shifali x Original Message From Lindeman Cheryl Sent Monday March PM To Sharma Shifali Subject RE Garden State Paper I think that the termination on Dec th may have been a termination of the GSP ENA financial ISDA not the physical deal Cheryl Lindeman Smith Street EB Houston Texas Phone Fax Original Message From Sharma Shifali Sent Monday March PM To Lindeman Cheryl Subject Garden State Paper Cheryl We have a physical recyled paper deal YM with Garden State that was done on February The Termination log that Stephanie Panus sends us shows the termination date for Garden State as December Does this mean that this particular deal is valid and do we keep it on the books as a live deal Thanks Shifali x

Ill be out of the office from the th of April I wont be back till the th Michelle Nelson x will run your daily book and John Swinney x will be available to answer any questions you may have Thanks Shifali
